projects.name: Crossover Modules
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes mod which adds several new modules which are crossovers of two or more of the vanilla modules.
projects.remark: No longer maintained by me. Below is the link to the forked repository.

projects.name: Color Morse
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module requiring a defuser to perform mathematics encoded in Morse code.
projects.remark: No longer maintained by me. Below is the link to the forked repository.

projects.name: Ring Cases
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes mod which adds two new circular/ring-shaped bomb casings.

projects.name: Varicolored Squares
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module which can only be defused by selecting certain colored byttons at different times.
projects.remark: As this module is part of a collection, the full repository is linked below.

projects.name: Ice Cream
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module which can only be defused by serving your customers their favorite ice cream flavor.
projects.remark: No longer maintained by me. Below is the link to the forked repository.

projects.name: Edgework
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module where the defuser must periodically answer question about the edgework of the bomb.

projects.name: FizzBuzz
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module where the defuser must play a game of FizzBuzz to solve.
projects.remark: No longer maintained by me. Below is the link to the forked repository.

projects.name: Boolean Venn Diagram
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module where the defuser must play a game of FizzBuzz to solve.

projects.name: KTANE Command Line
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes mod which adds a command-line cheat console to the game.

projects.name: LEGO
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes module where the defuser must build a LEGO structure to solve it.

projects.name: Log Viewer Hotkey
projects.description: A Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes mod which allows easy log file management.

projects.name: ResuMaster
projects.description: A Java-based Resume Builder which allows easy creation, management, and reviewing of resumes.

projects.name: mattrm.dev
projects.description: The code and generation scripts for this website.

projects.name: B+ Tree Visualizer
projects.description: A B+ tree visualization tool akin this tool, written in C++.

projects.name: ASM Fixer
projects.description: A Python script to format Intel x86 assembly source code to a common code and comment style. Built primarily for my Introduction to Computer Systems course.

projects.name: Base Converter
projects.description: A game to practice quickly converting between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal.

projects.name: Savannah Calculator
projects.description: A simple psuedo-scientific calculator whose buttons play sound effects from my friend Savannah.

projects.name: Uncertainty Calculator
projects.description: A simple calculator which can perform simple calculations with quantaties with uncertainties. Originally made for my Physics courses to check my work.

projects.name: Mario Bros.
projects.description: A C++ recreation of the classic game Mario Bros. This was the final project of my Introduction to Computer Science I course.

projects.name: Shape Shift
projects.description: A simple game where the player must use the ability of different shapes in order to platform through each level. My team's submission in the 2018 Chillenium game jam. The theme was "transformation".

projects.name: ConvexPy
projects.description: An esoteric programming language which was eventually set to succeed my other golfing language Convex.

projects.name: Minecraft "Byte" Counter
projects.description: A MCEdit plugin/tool to count the amount of "bytes" within a Minecraft program. Originally created to standardize byte counting for code golfing competitions.

projects.name: SUPERFIGHT Online
projects.description: An online, slimmed down version of the card game SUPERFIGHT, designed for travel play.

projects.name: Convex
projects.description: An stack-based esoteric programming language based on the language CJam, designed for code-golfing competitions.

projects.name: Battleship
projects.description: A Python-based console battleship game with cusomizable ship sizes, board layouts, and game rules. My winning submission to the 2017 Agua Fria Union High School District STEM Expo.

projects.name: Glava
projects.description: An esoteric Java dialect designed for code golf competitions.

projects.name: Basic Function Language
projects.description: My first step into "proper" programming language design. A Python-based basic function programming language (as the name suggests).

projects.name: Last Stand
projects.description: A Western duel card game that I designed. The GitHub link below is contains the Squib code to generate the cards.

projects.name: Bible Reading Plan Notifier
projects.description: A Python script to automatically send emails with Bible verses using a Google Sheets sheet as a database.

projects.name: Mastermind
projects.description: A Java-based Mastermind recreation. My submission for the AP Computer Science Principles exam Create performance task.
